63 namespace Teuchos {

68 enum EValidateUsed {
69  VALIDATE_USED_ENABLED /*< \brief Validate that parameters in <tt>*this</tt> list
70  set using the default value are present in
71  the validation list */
72  ,VALIDATE_USED_DISABLED /*< \brief Do not validate that parameters in <tt>*this</tt> list
73  set using the default value are present in
74  the validation list */
75 };
76 
80 enum EValidateDefaults {
81  VALIDATE_DEFAULTS_ENABLED /*< \brief Validate that parameters in <tt>*this</tt> list
82  set using the default value are present in
83  the validation list */
84  ,VALIDATE_DEFAULTS_DISABLED /*< \brief Do not validate that parameters in <tt>*this</tt> list
85  set using the default value are present in
86  the validation list */
87 };

119  class PrintOptions {
120  public:
121  PrintOptions() : indent_(0), showTypes_(false), showFlags_(false), showDoc_(false) {}
122  PrintOptions& indent(int _indent) { indent_ = _indent; return *this; }
123  PrintOptions& showTypes(bool _showTypes) { showTypes_ = _showTypes; return *this; }
124  PrintOptions& showFlags(bool _showFlags) { showFlags_ = _showFlags; return *this; }
125  PrintOptions& showDoc(bool _showDoc) { showDoc_ = _showDoc; return *this; }
126  PrintOptions& incrIndent(int indents) { indent_ += indents; return *this; }
127  int indent() const { return indent_; }
128  bool showTypes() const { return showTypes_; }
129  bool showFlags() const { return showFlags_; }
130  bool showDoc() const { return showDoc_; }
131  PrintOptions copy() const { return PrintOptions(*this); }
132  private:
133  int indent_;
134  bool showTypes_;
135  bool showFlags_;
136  bool showDoc_;
137  };

736 // Set functions
737 
738 
739 template<typename T>
740 inline
741 ParameterList& ParameterList::set(
742  std::string const& name_in, T const& value_in, std::string const& docString_in,
743  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> const& validator_in
744  )
745 {
746  typedef StringIndexedOrderedValueObjectContainerBase SIOVOCB;
747  const Ordinal param_idx = params_.getObjOrdinalIndex(name_in);
748  if (param_idx != SIOVOCB::getInvalidOrdinal()) {
749  Ptr<ParameterEntry> param = params_.getNonconstObjPtr(param_idx);
750  const std::string docString =
751  (docString_in.length() ? docString_in : param->docString());
752  const RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> validator =
753  (nonnull(validator_in) ? validator_in : param->validator());
754  // Create temp param to validate before setting
755  ParameterEntry param_new(value_in, false, false, docString, validator );
756  if (nonnull(validator)) {
757  validator->validate(param_new, name_in, this->name());
758  }
759  // Strong guarantee: (if exception is thrown, the value is not changed)
760  *param = param_new;
761  }
762  else {
763  ParameterEntry param_new(value_in, false, false, docString_in, validator_in);
764  if (nonnull(param_new.validator())) {
765  param_new.validator()->validate(param_new, name_in, this->name());
766  }
767  params_.setObj(name_in, param_new);
768  }
769  return *this;
770 }
771 
772

774 ParameterList& ParameterList::set(
775  std::string const& name_in, char value[], std::string const& docString
776  ,RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> const& validator

790 ParameterList& ParameterList::set(

792  )

795  return *this;
796 }

799 inline
800 ParameterList& ParameterList::setEntry(std::string const& name_in, ParameterEntry const& entry_in)
801 {
802  params_.setObj(name_in, entry_in);
803  return *this;
804 }

806 
807 // Get functions
808 
809 
810 template<typename T>
811 T& ParameterList::get(const std::string& name_in, T def_value)
812 {
813  typedef StringIndexedOrderedValueObjectContainerBase SIOVOCB;
814  Ordinal param_idx = params_.getObjOrdinalIndex(name_in);
815  if (param_idx == SIOVOCB::getInvalidOrdinal()) {
816  // Param does not exist
817  param_idx = params_.setObj(name_in, ParameterEntry(def_value, true));
818  }
819  Ptr<ParameterEntry> param = params_.getNonconstObjPtr(param_idx);
820  this->template validateEntryType<T>("get", name_in, *param);
821  return getValue<T>(*param);
822 }
823 
824 
825 inline
826 std::string& ParameterList::get(const std::string& name_in, char def_value[])
827 { return get(name_in, std::string(def_value)); }
828 
829 
830 inline
831 std::string& ParameterList::get(const std::string& name_in, const char def_value[])
832 { return get(name_in, std::string(def_value)); }
833 
834 
835 template<typename T>
836 T& ParameterList::get(const std::string& name_in)
837 {
838  ParameterEntry *foundEntry = this->getEntryPtr(name_in);
839  validateEntryExists("get",name_in,foundEntry);
840  this->template validateEntryType<T>("get",name_in,*foundEntry);
841  return getValue<T>(*foundEntry);
842 }
843 
844 
845 template<typename T>
846 const T& ParameterList::get(const std::string& name_in) const
847 {
848  const ParameterEntry *foundEntry = this->getEntryPtr(name_in);
849  validateEntryExists("get",name_in,foundEntry);
850  this->template validateEntryType<T>("get",name_in,*foundEntry);
851  return getValue<T>(*foundEntry);
852 }
853 
854 
855 template<typename T>
856 inline
857 T* ParameterList::getPtr(const std::string& name_in)
858 {
859  typedef StringIndexedOrderedValueObjectContainerBase SIOVOCB;
860  const Ordinal param_idx = params_.getObjOrdinalIndex(name_in);
861  if (param_idx != SIOVOCB::getInvalidOrdinal()) {
862  const Ptr<ParameterEntry> param_ptr = params_.getNonconstObjPtr(param_idx);
863  if (param_ptr->isType<T>()) {
864  return &param_ptr->getValue<T>(0);
865  }
866  // Note: The above is inefficinet. You have to do the dynamic_cast twice
867  // (once to see if it is the type and once to do the cast). This could be
868  // made more efficinet by upgrading Teuchos::any to add a any_cast_ptr()
869  // function but I don't think anyone actually uses this function.
870  return 0;
871  }
872  return 0;
873 }
874 
875 
876 template<typename T>
877 inline
878 const T* ParameterList::getPtr(const std::string& name_in) const
879 {
880  typedef StringIndexedOrderedValueObjectContainerBase SIOVOCB;
881  const Ordinal param_idx = params_.getObjOrdinalIndex(name_in);
882  if (param_idx != SIOVOCB::getInvalidOrdinal()) {
883  const Ptr<const ParameterEntry> param_ptr = params_.getObjPtr(param_idx);
884  if (param_ptr->isType<T>()) {
885  return &param_ptr->getValue<T>(0);
886  }
887  // Note: The above is inefficinet, see above non-const getPtr() function.
888  return 0;
889  }
890  return 0;
891 }
892 
893 
894 inline
895 ParameterEntry& ParameterList::getEntry(const std::string& name_in)
896 {
897  ParameterEntry *foundEntry = this->getEntryPtr(name_in);
898  validateEntryExists("get", name_in, foundEntry);
899  return *foundEntry;
900 }
901 
902 
903 inline
904 const ParameterEntry& ParameterList::getEntry(const std::string& name_in) const
905 {
906  const ParameterEntry *foundEntry = this->getEntryPtr(name_in);
907  validateEntryExists("get", name_in, foundEntry);
908  return *foundEntry;
909 }
910 
911 
912 inline
913 ParameterEntry*
914 ParameterList::getEntryPtr(const std::string& name_in)
915 {
916  typedef StringIndexedOrderedValueObjectContainerBase SIOVOCB;
917  const Ordinal param_idx = params_.getObjOrdinalIndex(name_in);
918  if (param_idx != SIOVOCB::getInvalidOrdinal()) {
919  return &*params_.getNonconstObjPtr(param_idx);
920  }
921  return 0;
922 }
923 
924 
925 inline
926 const ParameterEntry*
927 ParameterList::getEntryPtr(const std::string& name_in) const
928 {
929  typedef StringIndexedOrderedValueObjectContainerBase SIOVOCB;
930  const Ordinal param_idx = params_.getObjOrdinalIndex(name_in);
931  if (param_idx != SIOVOCB::getInvalidOrdinal()) {
932  return &*params_.getObjPtr(param_idx);
933  }
934  return 0;
935 }
936 
937 
938 inline RCP<ParameterEntry>
939 ParameterList::getEntryRCP(const std::string& name_in)
940 {
941  typedef StringIndexedOrderedValueObjectContainerBase SIOVOCB;
942  const Ordinal param_idx = params_.getObjOrdinalIndex(name_in);
943  if (param_idx != SIOVOCB::getInvalidOrdinal()) {
944  return rcpFromPtr(params_.getNonconstObjPtr(param_idx));
945  }
946  return null;
947 }
948 
949 
950 inline RCP<const ParameterEntry>
951 ParameterList::getEntryRCP(const std::string& name_in) const
952 {
953  typedef StringIndexedOrderedValueObjectContainerBase SIOVOCB;
954  const Ordinal param_idx = params_.getObjOrdinalIndex(name_in);
955  if (param_idx != SIOVOCB::getInvalidOrdinal()) {
956  return rcpFromPtr(params_.getObjPtr(param_idx));
957  }
958  return null;
959 }

971 
972 #ifndef DOXYGEN_SHOULD_SKIP_THIS
973 template<typename T>
974 bool ParameterList::isType(const std::string& name_in, T* /*ptr*/) const
975 {
976  typedef StringIndexedOrderedValueObjectContainerBase SIOVOCB;
977  const Ordinal param_idx = params_.getObjOrdinalIndex(name_in);
978  if (param_idx != SIOVOCB::getInvalidOrdinal()) {
979  return params_.getObjPtr(param_idx)->isType<T>();
980  }
981  return false;
982 }
983 #endif
984 
985 
986 template<typename T>
987 bool ParameterList::isType(const std::string& name_in) const
988 {
989  return this->isType(name_in, static_cast<T*>(0));
990 }

1040 
1041 template<typename T>
1042 inline
1043 void ParameterList::validateEntryType(
1044  const std::string &/*funcName*/, const std::string &name_in,
1045  const ParameterEntry &entry_in
1046  ) const
1047 {
1048  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PURE_MSG(
1049  entry_in.getAny().type() != typeid(T), Exceptions::InvalidParameterType
1050  ,"Error! An attempt was made to access parameter \""<<name_in<<"\""
1051  " of type \""<<entry_in.getAny().typeName()<<"\""
1052  "\nin the parameter (sub)list \""<<this->name()<<"\""
1053  "\nusing the incorrect type \""<<TypeNameTraits<T>::name()<<"\"!"
1054  );
1055 }

1156 }

1158 
1170 template<typename T>
1171 void setStringParameterFromArray(
1172  const std::string &paramName
1173  ,const Array<T> &array
1174  ,ParameterList *paramList
1175  )
1176 {
1177  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT(!paramList);
1178  paramList->set(paramName,toString(array));
1179 }
1180 
1181 
1246 template<typename T>
1247 Array<T> getArrayFromStringParameter(
1248  const ParameterList &paramList
1249  ,const std::string &paramName
1250  ,const int arrayDim = -1
1251  ,const bool mustExist = true
1252  )
1253 {
1254  std::string arrayStr;
1255  if(mustExist) {
1256  arrayStr = getParameter<std::string>(paramList,paramName);
1257  }
1258  else {
1259  const std::string
1260  *arrayStrPtr = getParameterPtr<std::string>(paramList,paramName);
1261  if(arrayStrPtr) {
1262  arrayStr = *arrayStrPtr;
1263  }
1264  else {
1265  return Array<T>(); // Return an empty array
1266  }
1267  }
1268  Array<T> a;
1269  try {
1270  a = fromStringToArray<T>(arrayStr);
1271  }
1272  catch( const InvalidArrayStringRepresentation&) {
1273  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PURE_MSG(
1274  true, Exceptions::InvalidParameterValue
1275  ,"Error! The parameter \""<<paramName<<"\"\n"
1276  "in the sublist \""<<paramList.name()<<"\"\n"
1277  "exists, but the std::string value:\n"
1278  "----------\n"
1279  <<arrayStr<<
1280  "\n----------\n"
1281  "is not a valid array represntation!"
1282  );
1283  }
1284  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PURE_MSG(
1285  ( ( a.size()>0 && arrayDim>=0 ) && static_cast<int>(a.size())!=arrayDim )
1286  ,Exceptions::InvalidParameterValue
1287  ,"Error! The parameter \""<<paramName<<"\"\n"
1288  "in the sublist \""<<paramList.name()<<"\"\n"
1289  "exists and is a valid array, but the dimension of\n"
1290  "the read in array a.size() = " << a.size() << "\n"
1291  "was not equal to the expected size arrayDim = " << arrayDim << "!"
1292  );
1293  return a;
1294 }
1295 
1296 
1300 inline
1301 RCP<ParameterList> sublist(
1302  const RCP<ParameterList> &paramList, const std::string& name,
1303  bool mustAlreadyExist = false, const std::string& docString = ""
1304  )
1305 {
1306  return rcpWithEmbeddedObjPostDestroy(
1307  &paramList->sublist(name, mustAlreadyExist, docString), paramList, false );
1308 }
1309 
1310 
1314 inline
1315 RCP<const ParameterList> sublist(
1316  const RCP<const ParameterList> &paramList, const std::string& name
1317  )
1318 {
1319  return rcpWithEmbeddedObjPostDestroy(
1320  &paramList->sublist(name), paramList, false );
1321 }
